gw.api.web.policy

Class ListBillInvoicingOverridesHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.web.policy.ListBillInvoicingOverridesHelper

  • public class ListBillInvoicingOverridesHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper for changing the billing method of a PolicyPeriod to ListBill (or modifying the billing details of a PolicyPeriod that is already ListBill).

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getListBillAccount

        public Account getListBillAccount()

      • setListBillAccount

        public void setListBillAccount(Account account)
        Sets the target ListBill Account that the policyPeriod will be paid by.

        Important note: setting the Account overrides the PaymentPlan and InvoiceStream, setting both to null!

        Parameters:
        account - a ListBill Account
